‘You don’t mess with him’: How housing advocate wields power by funding ballot measures

The Wizard of SoMa, John Elberling, has been a lightning rod in the city’s housing wars. Critics blame him for the demise of 495 units near Market and Sixth streets, and question his spending millions of dollars from his nonprofit on political campaigns. Supporters say he has been a big force in keeping SoMa affordable.
